properties.entry: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID =? AND USER_PWD =? AND STATUS ='Y'
INSERT INTO MEMBER(USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, INTEREST) VALUES (SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_NAME=?, PHONE=?, EMAIL=?, ADDRESS=?, INTEREST=?, MODIFY_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID=?
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID=? AND STATUS='Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_PWD=?, MODIFY_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID=? AND USER_PWD=?
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS='N', MODIFY_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID=? AND USER_PWD=?
